column4: I can not boot more often than I can. Boot process just loops. I think the problem is failure to "talk" to my CPU? Please see: http://pastebin.com/m7388d9e4 for some output, need help troubleshooting this!
what type of pc and mainly: what does it do? loose power?
the boot process fails and returns to the BIOS POST
not, the output is at http://pastebin.com/m7388d9e4
